channel.title: Membership Ain't work fully

item.title: Membership Ain't work fully
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

That’s what i mean, The command changes Membership to 1 till they log out, nothing get putted in the member text file.

Read full topic

item.title: Membership Ain't work fully
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

Instead of trying to deal with variables, I recommend just send their account name to a text file, where the server will check if their name is in there or not. If it is, they’re a member, and the other way around. That’s what I did on my server and it works flawlessly.

Read full topic

item.title: Membership Ain't work fully
item.dc:creator: @Darkness_Pk Darkness Pk
item.description:
@Darkness_Pk wrote:

Well I’ve the Membership:

[code] if (command.startsWith(“membership”)) {
String member = command.substring(11);

        sendMessage("Player " + member + " has become a Member!");

        for (int a = 1; a < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; a++) {
            if (PlayerHandler.players[a] != null) {
                if (PlayerHandler.players[a].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(
                        member)) {
                    PlayerHandler.players[a].playerIsMember = 1;
                }
            }
        }

    }[/code]

But when I give it to someone and the player logs out the character is member get reset to zero, someone knows how to fix that?

character-ismember = 0

Read full topic
